Rockford.Marinelli Field:
Marinelli Field is a stadium in Rockford, Illinois located in Blackhawk Park and is overseen by the Rockford Park District. It is primarily used for baseball. It has served as the stadium for two minor league franchises:
Rockford RiverHawks (2002–2005)
Rockford Reds (1999)
Rockford Cubbies (1995–1998)
Rockford Royals (1993–1994)
Rockford Expos (1988–1992)
In addition, it is the current home of the amateur Rockford Foresters, a summer collegiate-league team.
